scripts.say: Everybody seems to be in quite a rush... Did something happen earlier this morning?
Oh, you're finally here. There's something not so great going on. Just follow me.
The two hurried off to the place where everyone was gathering.
That place being in front of the exercise's information board.！
Are you stupid?
"If I can participate then Amagi won't need to come to the exercise"? Then what? Are you going to fight with unfinished equipment and sheer naive motivation?
You're one to talk! You ran away from the battle with your tails between your legs!
Listen, you absolute idiot. That sly, conniving she-fox is an expert at tricking people with her dirty little schemes.
Just because she's appearing in person at the frontlines doesn't mean I'll lower my guard and get lured out by her, no matter what an idiot like you says.
And furthermore, I'm a battleship. I'm completely different from battlecruisers like you two.
Just look at how thin your armor is. Do you think I, a battleship, have any reason to be scared of fighting you?？
How dare you! Unlike you, nee-sama and I have always focused on speed! How would a snail like you catch up to us cruising at 30 knots?
Hah, you're not telling me you're PROUD of how fast you can run away, are you?
...Your hair color says it all, the inside of your head is as white as a blank canvas, you idiot!
No you, you bootlicker! Your only redeeming feature is that big rack of yours...!
-- CLANG!
Owww?!
The two sisters who seemed on the brink of starting a fight fell silent in the blink of an eye from the intense rage they could sense.
Who is this "sly, conniving she-fox" you speak of~?
Nee-sama!
-- CLANG!
Didn't I tell you to be nice to everyone~? Why are you picking a fight with Kaga~?
There, now let's be nice and shake hands~
Amagi smiled and forced Akagi and Kaga to hold hands.
...They both had bumps forming on their heads.
-- That woman seriously freaks me out.
Hidden beneath Amagi's loving smile was a rage that would frighten even the most vile of beasts. All the bystanders knew this for a fact.
There, now you've reconciled and will live happily ever after.
Akagi and Kaga couldn't stop their tears.
The future of the Sakura Empire lies in our hands, and if we're not all nice to each other then we won't be able to defeat our enemies~
Now, today's exercise will be starting soon, so could everyone return to their posts?
Both sisters started tightening their own grip on the other's hand, seemingly because they hadn't quite reached a mutual understanding yet.
Nevertheless, overwhelmed by Amagi's silent rage, they both reluctantly let go of the other's hand and began walking in opposite directions.
You got away this time, bootlicker. Next time I see you on the battlefield I'll make you understand the class difference between us.
Hmph! Before the day is over I will make YOU understand that Amagi is the strongest of her class, so don't think you can run away again.
The crowd of onlookers who had gathered around began to disperse as well. And then...
The only person left was Amagi who stood there in silence, lost in her own thoughts.
